column2: title=Hither Shore Band 9: Tolkien's Influence on Fantasy

column5: articlename=Tolkien's Influence on Fantasy - Tolkien: Hither Shore Band 9

column1: '''''Hither Shore'' Band 9: ''Tolkien's Influence on Fantasy''''' is the tenth volume of the journal ''[[Hither Shore (journal)
**"Über die (Un-)Möglichkeit, literarischen Einfluss nachzuweisen" by [[Thomas Fornet-Ponse]]
**"The Inner Consistency of Reality: J.R.R. Tolkien, Flannery O'Connor, Michael D. O'Brien, Jonathan Franzen" by Guglielmo Spirito and Emanuele Rimoli
**"'Monster', Mode und Moneten — 'Völkerromane', ihre Beziehung zu Tolkiens Werk und das Marketing" by Friedhelm Schneidewind
**"An Old Light Rekindled: Tolkien's Influence on Fantasy" by Anna Thayer
**"Ähnlichkeiten der Figurenkonstellationen in ''Der Herr der Ringe'' und ''Harry Potter''" by  Anja Stürzer
**"Rätsel in ''The Hobbit'' und in Walter Moers' ''Rumo''" by Antje Rügamer
**"''The Lord of the Rings'' and ''Memorias de Idhún''" by Natalia González de la Llana
**"Eine Analyse des ''Shannara''-Zyklus von Terry Brooks" by Frank Weinreich
**"Two Swedish Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien" by [[Morgan Thomsen]] and [[Shaun Gunner]]
